name: Ball Island
description:
CONTROLS

Use left and right arrow keys to change the position of the camera. 

To move the ball use the WASD keys. 

You can shoot with the left shift key. 

To jump use the spacebar.

POWERUPS

Orange Diamond -> Makes the player more stronger.

Green Diamond -> You can shoot bullets when this powerup is active.(Left Shift key)

Blue Diamond -> You can smash enemies using this powerup.(Spacebar)
